name: @safe-global/protocol-kit
description: SDK that facilitates the interaction with Safe Smart Accounts

scripts.test:hardhat:ethers:v1.0.0: export TEST_NETWORK=hardhat && export ETH_LIB=ethers && export SAFE_VERSION=1.0.0 && testing-kit deploy && nyc testing-kit test 'tests/e2e/*.test.*'

scripts.build: yarn unbuild && yarn check-safe-deployments &&  yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:types
